name: Terra
description:
The cradle of mankind.
A blue jewel floating in space.

name: Rorke
description: A hot white star surrounded by a vast asteroid belt.

name: Smuggler Ship
description: A small vessel hidden in an asteroid belt. You had almost overlooked them if they hadn't contacted you.

trigger.not_activated_message: We are in dire need of repairs and ran out of gas.
trigger.activated_message: In exchange for your supplies we will give you this priceless artifact.

name: Magminus
description: A volcanic planet inhabited by a silicon-based species.

name: Silicon Valley
description: A valley near a volcanic geyser seems to be where the strange organisms gather.

trigger.activated_message: In the valley you find an uninhabited cave with an artifact!

name: Vega
description: A fertile world with rich aquatic life forms.

name: Aquatic City
description: a huge coral reef hosts a submarine sentient species

trigger.activated_message: After a long bargain you trade a container of medical goods for a strange artifact. You wonder who made the better deal.
trigger.not_activated_message: The aliens are friendly and seem to enjoy trading. They seem to have problems with aggressive bacteria though.

name: X2475
description: Neutron star with really nothing going on.

name: Sirius
description:
A sandy desert with seven beautiful orange moons.

A regular radar pulse emanates from the desert surface.

name: Sirian Desert
description:
Lots of nothing. The radar pulse is stronger here. It might come from a settlement or a ship.
However, the radiation level is rising in that direction as well.

trigger.activated_message: You discover an ancient shipwreck. Using a cache of gluons you clear up the radiation and enter. Inside you find an ancient artifact!
trigger.not_activated_message:
You discover an abandoned shipwreck emitting the pulse.
 However, there is lots of nuclear debris. You will need a strong neutron source to clean it up before you can enter.

name: Octygon
description: A dead rocky planet with mysterious underground caves.

name: Underground Caves
description: The caves are many miles deep and stretch over half of the planets surface.

trigger.activated_message: After two weeks of search, pingu discovers a hermit hamster living at the bottom of the cave. Upon hearing about your mission, they join you.
trigger.not_activated_message: You abandon the search after a week. You need more food supplies to explore the caves deeper.

name: Kucharsky
description: A huge light blue gas planet.

name: Centauri Station
description: A small space station marks the border of the Terran Federation.

name: Olympus
description: The home world of the Firstborn.

name: Alien Space Station
description: A huge monument made by an unknown civilization. A strange aura is present here.

trigger.not_activated_message: You do not seem to have the psychic energy to contact the aura.
trigger.activated_message: The hamster meditates for a long time. Finally the monolith opens! A portal is created and takes you far into the galaxy. More adventures await you.
